Package game.item

Class UpgradableItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.item.UpgradableItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, CanBeDroppedItem, UpgradableItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
HealingVial, StaminaVial
public abstract class UpgradableItem extends Item implements CanBeDroppedItem, UpgradableItemInterface
An abstract class for an upgradable item
